title: 买了正版，终于能玩正版服了
author: hp涛涛
txt_content:
现在已经去申请正版标识
顺便庆祝一下
入正版后有你们会先干什么，比如玩hypixel

replies.author: Steve#34
replies.txt_content: 当然是玩国际版hypixel，不过可能会有点卡。

replies.author: 小孩孩
replies.txt_content:
不知道，没买过正版
我太穷了

replies.author: Wudji
replies.txt_content: 记得去领勋章哦

replies.author: 梦江南
replies.txt_content: 可以说，大部分人用正版玩盗版服
欢迎入坑国际版正版！

replies.author: 名副其实
replies.txt_content: 喜提正版！前排祝贺

replies.author: kokodaaayo
replies.txt_content: 我原來玩hyp（正版），玩著玩著就封了。。。

replies.author: xiaoandada
replies.txt_content: hypixel咯 老哥头像有点帅

replies.author: Enderman3133
replies.txt_content:
kokodaaayo 发表于 2020-2-5 15:38
我原來玩hyp（正版），玩著玩著就封了。。。
有去申诉吗

replies.author: Steve#34
replies.txt_content: 你应该去申请正版勋章

replies.author: huan2huan2
replies.txt_content: 第一步当然是下载正版启动器发现无限更新失败打不开然后去把盗版启动器下回来了

replies.author: Sinbad_Official
replies.txt_content: 恭喜恭喜，一起玩呀

replies.author: White_i
replies.txt_content:
恭喜恭喜，一起玩呀
建议下个BOHE加速器

replies.author: 墨李
replies.txt_content: 我太穷了 买不起

replies.author: 喵鱿
replies.txt_content: 先去搞个皮肤啦~

replies.author: Spider_Queen
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: wodehao666
replies.txt_content: 记得去2b2t看看

replies.author: 黑白狐
replies.txt_content: 我买了正版后就没登过

replies.author: 伏羲大大
replies.txt_content: 先去正版大服转转咯

replies.author: Hartman.Ψ
replies.txt_content:
hypixel有专门的国际版中国线路
ip似乎是cn.hypixel.net

replies.author: HYCrazy
replies.txt_content: 贫穷的我都不敢想

replies.author: 洛林啊
replies.txt_content: 我觉得正版没什么可玩的

replies.author: soil-sword
replies.txt_content:
Hypixel
这是一直久仰大名的服务器了。
正版买成多少钱啊

replies.author: 卑微小吴
replies.txt_content: 你早点入正论坛还多送一块勋章

replies.author: Suzimo
replies.txt_content: 说实话 你这头像非常的欧力给！我刚通宵结束 看到他我瞬间没有了困意

replies.author: 天地情缘
replies.txt_content: 玩玩hypixel
